field.value: No FK created on SQLIte after calling CreateSchema

field.name: description
field.value: Hello, Today I create a demo with SQLite, and after calling the functionality CreateSchema(), I see there is no FK created. If I did with SqlServer Express 2k5, I see some FKs. I'm not debug it, so I guess may be this issue belongs to SQLite for .NET library. Do you think the error can cause from CastleActiveRecord?
